PriceProtectExecLineItem.name: PriceProtectExecLineItem
PriceProtectExecLineItem.description: Represents a line item created as part of a Price Protection Execution.

AccountId.description: References the partner account related to the transaction being evaluated for price protection.

CalculatedAmount.description: Total protected amount calculated based on the applicable price difference and quantity.

CalculationReferenceRecordId.description: References the rebate or pricing rule used to compute the claim.

ClaimReferenceId.description: Links to the related rebate claim, if one has been generated.

HasWarnings.description: Indicates if the execution line item has associated warnings.

InTransitQuantity.description: Quantity of the product in transit.

IsEligible.description: Indicates whether the record qualifies for price protection.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the record was last referenced by a user or system.

LastViewedDate.description: Date and timestamp when the record was last opened in the UI.

LocationId.description: References the inventory or sales location relevant to the line item.

Name.description: Auto-generated identifier for the line item record.

NewSalePricePerUnit.description: The new sale price per unit after the price change.

NewSalePriceType.description: Type of sale price applied post-adjustment (e.g., List Price, Net Price).

PriceDifference.description: Difference between the old and new sale price per unit.

PriceProtectionExecutionId.description: Links to the parent Price Protection Execution record.

PriceProtectionTermId.description: References the Price Protection Term used for evaluating eligibility and calculations.

ProductId.description: References the product involved in the price protection claim.

RemainingQuantity.description: Quantity of product still eligible for claim after partial adjustments.

SalePricePerUnit.description: Original sale price per unit before the price adjustment.

SalePriceType.description: Type of sale price recorded during the original transaction.

Status.description: Current processing state of the line item.

StatusReason.description: Additional explanation or message associated with the current status.

TransactionDate.description: Date when the original sale or transaction occurred.

TransactionReferenceId.description: Reference to the transaction record from which this line item originates.

WarningMessage.description: Descriptive warning associated with this line item, if applicable.
